trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Portsmouth
There were no other sightings in Portsmouth on or around November 17th 2009
Summary: Bright light, no beacon, changing directions, doing circles, changing colors
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were outside smoking when a star like light was spotted in the sky, white in color. It flew in a circle pattern 2 times then slowed down to almost a stand still. The light then began tracking to the right slowly and then to the left slowly. It entered what looked like a geo synchronous orbit and then changed its color to red and then back to white. It dimmed out several times and became brighter again. We watched it until it set behind the hill to the west. We could tell it was moving against the stars in the sky until it finally stopped and locked orbit. At first while watching the object we were wowed by it.
